contextId.information: The negative form here is used for emphasis and can be stated in a positive form. AT: "Please tell me the truth about everything I ask you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
contextId.quote: Please do not hide from me anything that I will ask you

contextId.information: This negative sentence is used for emphasis and can be stated in a positive form. AT: "We will kill every one of his men" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
contextId.quote: We will not leave even one of his men ... alive
